Subskills.name: Bone Density
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone spear.

Subskills.name: Mana Dweller
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of bone spear.

Subskills.name: Impaling Spine
Subskills.description: Throw a colossal bone spear dealing increased damage and knocking up monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Raising Spirits
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to summon a bone spirit.

Subskills.name: Bone Sling
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of bone spear.

Subskills.name: Disease Ridden Bone
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poisoned on hit.

Subskills.name: Sharp Edged Bone
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Bone Splinters
Subskills.description: Bone spears split into multiple smaller bone spears on hit.

Subskills.name: Bone Conjuring
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using bone spear.

Subskills.name: Fervoring Fever
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Spiritual Tradeoff
Subskills.description: Increases damage based on your energy but now depletes a portion of it as additional mana cost.

Subskills.name: Bone Nova
Subskills.description: Bone spear now explodes into a bone nova on hit dealing increased damage and stunning on hit.

Subskills.name: Plenty of Bone
Subskills.description: Throw multiple smaller bone spears in an arc.
